# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Electricity generator at position(106.5, -32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

### Stone furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them.
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not waiting for source items or have no fuel.

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump is working and has a connection to the boiler.

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the electricity network.

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that pipe groups are not empty and have a full output.

### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that belt groups are not empty and have a connection to the transport belts.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
Note: The agent has not invoked any functions or assigned any variables, so there is no information to report in this section.
